name: Allison Russell
text: The staff was friendly and helpful but the food wasn't all that memorable. The staff knew their products and services but the food was rather bland. We enjoyed our time there and will likely be back to give the food a second try.

name: Marcus Clark
text: I ordered a pizza on 2/9/18 that was suppose to have 2 toppings. The pizza came 2 hours later with just cheese. I called Toppers to let them know that the pizza was wrong, and the staff apologized. He stated they were extremely busy and he ‚Ä¶More

name: Allison Wilkins
text: First timer and will definitely be back. The establishment is extremely clean. When the employees didn't have customers, they were cleaning. I like how we were able to watch our pizza being made. The kids enjoyed it. There were so many ‚Ä¶More

name: Lucas Wilson
text: This place was great. I really appreciated how quickly I was taken care of. The pizza was great as well. I‚Äôll return often now that I know you‚Äôre here.

name: stephanie rupp
text: When they first opened we ordered pizza and it was good.  This time however the medium pizza looks more like a large personal pan.  I ordered 3 different pizza's 2 hand tossed and one thin crust (it is like cracker thin) all 3 were burnt. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chi Chi Bardell
text: Loved the vibe and atmosphere. The service was great and the staff even better! Can't wait to add this to our weekly routine: )

name: Jagdish Dholaria
text: We had a gift certificate for Indianapolis location which was under repair. I talked to an employee and he said they will honor it since Indianapolis location was under repair. Few minutes later, i called again to order pizza. "General ‚Ä¶More

name: George Miller
text: AVOID THIS RESTAURANT LIKE THE PLAGUE.  They have the absolute WORST customer service I've ever encountered and the fact that there are so many pizza options out there I don't know why. I will never order from them again. Since they opened, ‚Ä¶More

name: Blake Patterson
text: Best pizza in town in my opinion!!! Very good service an the options of toppings an special orders is almost infinite. I am a big fan, wouldn't surprise me to see this chain put some pizza places in Greenwood out of business!

name: SCOTT BRADLEY
text: Love this pizza! I first had it in Wisconsin a few years ago. And I was excited to see there was a store in my neck of the woods! Great Pizza and Cheesy Bread! But they only deliver in a small radius, Which is a disadvantage for a Friday night delivery.

name: Brad Vanbuskirk
text: Use to eat here and loved it but every time we ordered a pizza it had hardly any toppings! So we thought ok we'll just order EXTRA on and fix the problem! Wrong it was even WORSE! EVEN AFTER TALKING TO THE MANAGER MANY TIMES OVER THE SAME ISSUE! TOPPERS LOST OUR BUSINESS FOR EVER!! ITS A SHAMEüò¢üò¢

name: Tucker Hewitt
text: Our new Pizza of choice. Great pizza at a good value. Delivery is usually quick. Cooked perfectly with topping galore. Sticks and marinara are a must!

name: Sarah Thompson
text: Yes i have had the same problem with the gm of toppers. Never got his name tho heavy set tall white guy out of uniform high with a gun. I have not stepped back in the store since that day. Nor will i do business with them. Final.

name: Jennifer Ramey
text: Our family loves the Topperstix and pizza but delivery is extremely slow and they don‚Äôt answer the store phone when you call. The last two times we ordered it took over two hours to get our food delivered with no apologies. Very disappointed in the customer service.

name: Robert Pinegar
text: Second time I've ordered from Toppers. I've  never had better customer service from any pizza shop. Very informative and friendly. Spot on with the recommendations as well. A product you will get nowhere else.

name: Sabrina
text: The pizza is great but this is the second order out of the 4 times I‚Äôve ordered that delivery has taken forever, currently waiting for an order I placed 2 hours ago. Had to call and cancel my order because still two hours later and they ‚Ä¶More

name: Sydney Louzon
text: First time ordering from Toppers. Our house is out of delivery area so they offered a great discount if we picked it up from the store, done. The nacho pizza was amazing would have gladly paid full price.

name: Angel w
text: Amazing pizza. Ordered here mulitple times at work..Never disappoints. Quick delivery. Love Toppers.

name: Scott OBrien
text: First timer... Ordered dine-in on FathersDay and the 4 of us sat at the pizza bar. They are limited on dine-in space. We ordered right in the middle of a rush so did take longer than expected BUT the appeared to be under staffed crew of ‚Ä¶More

name: Alicia M.
text: Terrible customer service! Been going to this restaurant since before they officially opened.  Loyal customer/family who visited frequently. I dealt with many mistakes when they first opened, feeling those were just "growing pains." ‚Ä¶More

name: Erin Avey
text: Excellent pizza and cheese sticks. Really good value as well! Will defiantly be back!

name: Corbin Dick
text: The product would be better if it was more consitent and the meats and cheeses that were used were stored properly

name: jenna suzanne
text: We ate in the store and watched them make pizza, the kids loved it and the food was delicious.

name: Tasha Colvin
text: This pizza is amazing! I have been to them three times and the pizza is hot with fresh ingredients!

name: Gregory Nelson-Brothers
text: They only deliver to places 8 minutes away? That‚Äôs ridiculous. I ordered from the one in Carmel all the time and never had a problem. Haven‚Äôt seen too many good things about this one.

name: Nicholas Milli
text: Not satisfied with the customer service and will spread nothing good about this business due to the lack of customer care. How are you going to deliver me pizza four days ago and then we order tonight and you won't deliver?!?!?! This is a great business model. I hope your business fails epically.

name: Laura Stanley
text: We ordered a pizza for pickup. Went to pick it up. Wasn‚Äôt ready. Waited at least 45 minutes, was told that ‚Äúit would be done shortly.‚Äù Waited. Nothing. The team member said that ‚Äúhe didn‚Äôt know what happened to it.‚Äù They claimed they ‚Ä¶More

name: Noah Dwyer
text: Had the pizza for the first time it was delicious I will definitely order from here again

name: James Reynolds
text: Last 3 orders... 1. Both pizzas wrong and no driver 2. Pizza wrong and "out of ingredients" 3. No driver... Looks like Jakamos from now on. Sad because toppers has a good pie :/

name: Kristen Vargas
text: I have came into the store to get pizza for my family. The whole time I was in there the manger was yelling at employees he was out of uniform and what appeared to be high on something. Not a professional business man at all. He also carries a gun with him. Not a place I will going to visit again.

name: Ian Currie
text: This is our new favorite pizza place! Top notch!

name: Mary Lawrence
text: Tonight was the 2nd time I've ordered. And it was a complete BUST. Quesadilla was burnt...only could eat the center. Bacon and sausage pizza only had toppings in the the middle. 12 slivers of bacon.. 16 pieces of sausage for a medium pizza. I can unsubscribe from email. Disappointed and won't order again.

name: Rachel Estridge
text: Pizza arrived timely and hot, but both pies were dry not much sauce. Tasted very similar to papa johns. Nothing special

name: Bill Rollins
text: The picture on the advertisement we received in the mail looked nothing like the pizza we got delivered. We ordered the high boy crust that looks kinda like the old God Fathers pizza, instead it was like everyone else's, thick,  doughy, ‚Ä¶More

name: Darin Tucker
text: Unique and good.  Not the pizza you find at other pizza places.

name: Joel Fedell
text: LOVE Toppers! Pizzas are great and offer something different compared to others in the area.

name: Chassy C
text: Pizza is decent but the staff and the management are terrible especially the GM Cody Rzentkowski he rude arrogant feels the need to put others down, always seems to be messed up on something. If it weren't for him and his staff im sure you guys would have more satisfied customers from this location.

name: Ryan Powell
text: Toppers bread sticks are awesome pizza just ok but they do have some very interesting topping combinations

name: one me
text: So this is my first and last post on here.... im also contacting the greenwood police dept at this point. I was at toppers one night and the whole staff including the gm were high off of mushrooms... i have spoken to corperate in wisconsin, ‚Ä¶More

name: Shannon kivett
text: Awesome pizza!!  If you like spice,  get the nacho stix!!!

name: Christopher Gorbett
text: Kinda comparable to Little Ceasars price-wise and their pizza is much better made.

name: Wade Brant
text: Very good.  Excellent crust. Fresh toppings.

name: Michael Diamond Shawski Shaw
text: This food is the most amazing food ever you rock toppers!!!

name: Craig Wright
text: I have been a withness to more then one time  the manager of toppers out of uniform completely wasted yelling at his employees. I normally come in around closing time weekdays but stopped cause of the same reasom a unstable man with a gun is not my cup of tea... thanks toppers loved the stix

name: Eric Craig
text: Stix sound new, but are just pizza cut in Strips. Average taste.

name: Brandon Harmon
text: The pizza is really good, and the breadsticks are insane! Def recommend. We're repeat customers and have yet to be disappointed. We'll be back!

name: Bonna Hansen
text: I like their pizza, but they need more staff. 1 or 2 people running the place is not enough. Also, a manager sitting in the back yelling at them to answer the phone while they are making the food and helping in store customers does not count as a third. The wait is way too long.

name: patrick abban
text: Great pizzas and lots of custom options.

name: David DeWitt
text: It was very good pizza, and they delivered all the way to Planetary Brewing.

name: arripandaa chan
text: Love the staff love the pizza üíú

name: Wendy Murphy
text: Not sure what everyone else is raving about, this pizza was mediocre at best. The place was brand new, and very clean. Staff was very friendly and willing to help. Unfortunately, midway through our ordering at the counter, someone in the ‚Ä¶More

name: Zack W
text: I want a place I can take my family to sit down  and enjoy good pizza and a good time. Tired of all of these places opening that only offer carry out

name: Josiah Norton
text: This place has amazing pizza, and you can't beat their buy 2 for $9.99 deal (order online to get it)!

name: kent patterson
text: My first time. Good flavor good value, online ordering worked perfectly

name: Will Malone
text: The best pie n stix ive had in a while

name: Byron Chambers
text: Fantastic pizza, Great customer service!!

name: Shakib Daqqaq
text: It's amazing and a great pizza

name: Elizabeth Taylor-Kozak
text: Very friendly and professional.  The pizza was amazing...love the hand-tossed crust!

name: Quenitn Wilson
text: This place is freaking amazing.

name: joshua beers
text: Pizza was supposed to be here at 7pm it is now 9 pm and we were just told they are now remaking our pizza. Very disappointed in this business. My apartment complex is literally 5 minutes  from the strip mall location off 135.

name: Matt Browning
text: I just got pizza and bacon sticks and couldn't wait to try them so I did waiting on the pizza and they are so good I will definitely be a long time customer

name: Simon Mitchell
text: Pretty good, but seemed a bit sloppily made.

name: Cheryl Craig
text: Perfect little place in greenwood!!

name: Eric Curl
text: Very good handmade pizza

name: Jonathan Bryant
text: Grate  pizza  I would recommend it to everyone.. üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ

name: David Ongley

name: Doolin Danger

name: Jessica LaRue
text: Well you don't have to pay for food...they don't keep track of messed up orders, so you can call in and say they messed up your food a week ago and they will replace whatever you say at no charge...best pizza place ever!!!
